meanings.sent1: The picture frame is hangable on the wall.
meanings.sent2: The coat rack is designed to hold hangable items.
meanings.sent3: The hangable painting added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as hangable as a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The hangable curtains swayed gently in the breeze.

meanings.sent3: The hangable sign caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent4: His words were as hangable as a well-crafted poem.

meanings.definition: Able to be suspended from above.
meanings.sent1: The chandelier is a beautiful hangable light fixture.
meanings.sent2: The mobile features various hangable elements.
meanings.sent3: The hangable lanterns illuminated the garden at night.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as hangable as a melody in the air.
meanings.sent5: The hangable sculpture swayed gracefully in the wind.
